ai-patthana10.8:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana10.8:0.3_0: this is what is skillful, I say.
ai-patthana10.8:1.1_0: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.8:2.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana10.8:3.1_0: skilled in the ways of revealing corruptions.
ai-patthana10.8:4.1_0: There is no such thing as ‘the result of past’, the ninth result of all sorts.
